full_text:
Here is the extracted text content from the fact-check article:

Claim – UCC (Uniform Civil Code) support through a missed call number 9090902024 social media campaign.

Fact – No campaign launched by Modi government supporting UCC or a missed call campaign. Also not part of BJP's mega outreach program for 2024 general elections.

Several social media users are circulating a message requesting Hindus to give a missed call on 9090902024 to express support for Uniform Civil Code (UCC). The message claims that in just two days, 4 crore Muslims and 2 crore Christians have voted against UCC. Therefore, before the deadline of 6th July, all Hindus are being requested to vote in support of UCC. "Please give a missed call on 9090902024 to support UCC and save the country."

Newschecker searched for "UCC missed call 909090204" but found no reliable news reports about such a campaign.

However, a May 31, 2023 India Today report titled "BJP Launches Unique Missed Call Campaign Ahead of 2024 Lok Sabha Elections" was found.

The report states that BJP launched a unique missed call campaign with the number 9090902024, aiming to expand party support, similar to the membership drive in 2019.

The mobile number represents Modi government's nine years and the crucial 2024 Lok Sabha election year. BJP strategically chose this number while seeking a renewed mandate.

Similar reports were found in Economic Times and NDTV, describing this as BJP's mass connect program to mark nine years in power and prepare for the 2024 elections.

When Newschecker made a missed call, they received an SMS thanking them for supporting the Modi government and linking to a website about the government's nine years.

Conclusion: The claim about a missed call campaign supporting UCC is false. No such campaign is being conducted.

Result – False

Sources:
- India Today report, May 31, 2023
- NDTV report, May 31, 2023
- BJP press release, May 30, 2023
- BJP official website
- BJP webpage about mass connect drive
title: યુનિફોર્મ સિવિલ કોડ મામલે હિંદુઓ પાસે સમર્થન માટે મિસ્ડકોલ કરાવવાનું અભિયાન ન તો મોદી સરકાર કે ભાજપ દ્વારા ચલાવવામાં આવ્યું છે. ભાજપનો સાધારણ સમર્થન માટેના અભિયાનનો નંબર યુસીસી માટે સમર્થનના અભિયાન તરીકે વાઇરલ કરી દેવાયો છે.
vclaim: Social media messages claim that people can support the Uniform Civil Code (UCC) by giving a missed call to 9090902024, stating that 4 crore Muslims and 2 crore Christians have already voted against it. The viral message about the missed call campaign for UCC support is false, as the number 9090902024 is actually part of BJP's general outreach program for the 2024 elections and commemorating nine years of Modi government.
